title: doc: go1.5 release notes mentions '-asmflags' twice
body:
The [Go 1.5 release notes](http://tip.golang.org/doc/go1.5#go_command) mentions '-asmflags' twice under the "Go command" section.

The [Go 1.5 release notes](http://tip.golang.org/doc/go1.5#go_command) should not need to mention '-asmflags' twice under the "Go command" section.
